item.description:
Doors at 6PM, Show at 8PM

With: Grace Potter & The Nocturnals
gracepotter.com

THE BLACK CROWES are one of rock's best live acts and have been called a "thoroughbred American rock 'n' freakin' roll band." Their live shows feature alternating set lists and signature incendiary musical explorations that are designed to take audiences on a journey. The touring dynamos have played main stages from Bonnaroo to the Voodoo Music Experience to the New Orleans Jazz & Heritage Festival, celebrating nearly two decades of "Cosmic Rock-n-Roll" in front of sold-out audiences everywhere. THE BLACK CROWES have shared the stage with Jimmy Page, AC/DC, Bob Dylan, Grateful Dead, Aerosmith, The Rolling Stones, Neil Young and The Who. Now, with their new album WARPAINT, THE BLACK CROWES are ready to tour the world, bringing their Freak n' Roll to the devoted fans that have embraced them.

This is the 2nd night (Sunday) of two shows. The 1st show (Saturday) is SOLD OUT, so getting tickets in advance is recommended.

Tickets: $36 (plus surcharge) at casinoballroom.com

Official website: blackcrowes.com
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet for dinner or drinks beforehand and go to the venue
item.name: Black Crowes at Hampton Casino
